name: Hexa
storyline: You're the commander of Starship HEXA, the head of a space fleet dead-set on taking over the universe. You're well on your way to assuming control of everything that is and shall be, but your attack methods are a bit... unorthodox. We can't dwell on it for too long, though, so get out there and match those hexagons!
summary: HEXA is a unique, quick to pick up, and super fun logic puzzle game based on everybody's favorite polygon. Try for a high score in Arcade Mode, kick back in the low-stakes Chill Mode, or take on the seeded, dynamic Daily Run! See if you can't conquer the HEXAPLEX, wrangle those Power-ups, and maybe even become ruler of the universe along the way.
